title: Coalition poised to retake capital, but Yemen risks grow | Reuters
htmlTitle: Coalition poised to retake capital, but Yemen risks grow | Reuters
snippet: Aug 27, 2015 ... Weeks after seizing Yemen's southern port, Aden, members of a Saudi-led military coalition and the local fighters it supports say they are ...
htmlSnippet: Aug 27, 2015 ... Weeks after seizing Yemen's southern port, Aden, members of a Saudi-led military coalition and the local fighters it supports say they are ...

metatags.twitter:creator: @Reuters
metatags.og:description: Weeks after seizing Yemen's southern port, Aden, members of a Saudi-led military coalition and the local fighters it supports say they are poised to oust Iranian-allied Houthi forces from the capital Sanaa.

title: Yemenis bury remains of founder of Houthi rebel group | Reuters
htmlTitle: Yemenis bury remains of founder of Houthi rebel group | Reuters
snippet: Jun 5, 2013 ... SAADA, Yemen (Reuters) - Tens of thousands of Yemeni Shi'ite Muslims chanting “death to America” and “death to Israel” buried the remains of ...
htmlSnippet: Jun 5, 2013 ... SAADA, Yemen (Reuters) - Tens of thousands of Yemeni Shi'ite Muslims chanting “death to America” and “death to Israel” buried the remains of ...

metatags.twitter:creator: @Reuters
metatags.og:description: Tens of thousands of Yemeni Shi'ite Muslims chanting "death to America" and "death to Israel" buried the remains of the founder of the armed Houthi rebel group on Wednesday, nine years after he was killed in fighting with government forces.

title: Soldier kills 20 in shooting rampage in Thailand's northeast | Reuters
htmlTitle: Soldier kills 20 in shooting rampage in Thailand's northeast | Reuters
snippet: Feb 8, 2020 ... A Thai soldier shot dead at least 20 people Saturday, ... his gun slung over his shoulder with no sign of other people around.
htmlSnippet: Feb 8, 2020 ... A Thai soldier shot dead at least 20 people Saturday, ... his gun slung over his shoulder with no sign of other people around.

metatags.twitter:creator: @Reuters
metatags.og:description: A Thai soldier shot dead at least 20 people Saturday, posting messages on Facebook as he went on the rampage in a northeastern city where he was still holed up in a mall well over 12 hours after he first struck, authorities said.

title: Yemen president quits, throwing country deeper into chaos | Reuters
htmlTitle: Yemen president quits, throwing country deeper into chaos | Reuters
snippet: Jan 21, 2015 ... Yemeni President Abd-Rabbu Mansour Hadi resigned on Thursday, just days after Houthi rebels battled their way into his presidential palace, ...
htmlSnippet: Jan 21, 2015 ... Yemeni President Abd-Rabbu Mansour Hadi resigned on Thursday, just days after Houthi rebels battled their way into his presidential palace, ...

metatags.twitter:creator: @Reuters
metatags.og:description: Yemeni President Abd-Rabbu Mansour Hadi resigned on Thursday, just days after Houthi rebels battled their way into his presidential palace, plunging the unstable Arab country deeper into chaos and depriving Washington of a key ally against al Qaeda.

metatags.sailthru.description: Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthi movement has been battling a Saudi-led military coalition since 2015. U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said on Sunday Congress would be notified of his intent to designate the movement as a foreign terrorist organization, in what would be one...
